Text: Err... I think you got this in the wrong category. Since you can't edit a torrent, just upload the same torrent again in the proper category. I know it works, I've done it too... :-)
Who cares about the category? Just watch out next time.

Of course the goddamned category means something... unless perhaps you think when you order a steak at a restaurant and the waiter brings you a hot, steaming pile of cowshit and it's OK.

You idiots....
